|Title=Knowing the epidemiology of smoking among pregnant women
|Description=Knowledge
|Rubric=Epidemiology
|Contributors=
|Order=10}}


* Pregnancy
** half of pregnant women continue to smoke during pregnancy
** more frequently among the youngest and least educated women

question.title: What is a demographic characteristic that is more frequently associated with smoking during pregnancy?

option_a.title: Older women
option_a.description: Smokers who are over 35 years old

option_b.title: Youngest women
option_b.description: Smokers who are under 20 years old

option_c.title: Least educated women
option_c.description: Smokers with a high school diploma or less

correct_option.title: A
correct_option.description: A letter indicating the correct answer
